db:abstract.db:para: The QNativeGestureEvent class contains parameters that describe a gesture event.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Native gesture events are generated by the operating system, typically by interpreting touch events. Gesture events are high-level events such as zoom or rotate.

db:td.db:para: macOS: Two-finger douple tap (trackpad) / One-finger douple tap (magic mouse).

db:section.db:para: In addition, BeginNativeGesture and EndNativeGesture are sent before and after gesture event streams:
BeginNativeGesture ZoomNativeGesture ZoomNativeGesture ZoomNativeGesture EndNativeGesture

db:section.db:title: QNativeGestureEvent::QNativeGestureEvent(Qt::NativeGestureType type, const QPointF &localPos, const QPointF &windowPos, const QPointF &screenPos, qreal realValue, ulong sequenceId, quint64 intValue)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a native gesture event of type type.
The points localPos, windowPos and screenPos specify the gesture position relative to the receiving widget or item, window, and screen, respectively.
realValue is the macOS event parameter, sequenceId and intValue are the Windows event parameters.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] Qt::NativeGestureType QNativeGestureEvent::gestureType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the gesture type.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] const QPoint QNativeGestureEvent::globalPos() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the gesture as a QPointF in screen coordinates
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] const QPointF &QNativeGestureEvent::localPos() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the gesture as a QPointF, relative to the widget or item that received the event.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] const QPoint QNativeGestureEvent::pos() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the mouse cursor, relative to the widget or item that received the event.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] const QPointF &QNativeGestureEvent::screenPos() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the gesture as a QPointF in screen coordinates.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] qreal QNativeGestureEvent::value() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the gesture value. The value should be interpreted based on the gesture type. For example, a Zoom gesture provides a scale factor while a Rotate gesture provides a rotation delta.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.2] const QPointF &QNativeGestureEvent::windowPos() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the gesture as a QPointF, relative to the window that received the event.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.
